TopicTitle: To the creator of the Japanese Launch Vehicles Pack.

Articles.Content:
Your mod is really well done I like the attention to detail you taken to it, I love solid fuel rockets. Do you have plans for the HTV when you do the H-II?For those of you who don't know what mod I'm talking about:http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/japanese-launch-vehicles-pack/.congrats on 2096 DL's!

Edited February 13, 2014 by DarthVader
I agree, I badly want the HTV too, so I can "roleplay" the ISS.
